# Sonora Cholla Model Subset (External Data)

This directory contains externally sourced Sonora Cholla atmospheric model spectra
used by TASNI analyses.

## Source

- Zenodo record: `https://zenodo.org/record/5063476`
- Associated publication: Marley et al. (2021), ApJ, 920, 85

## Attribution Requirement

If you use these files, cite both:

1. Marley et al. (2021) for the Sonora Cholla model framework
2. The upstream Zenodo record for the distributed files

## Licensing And Terms

These files are distributed under the original upstream terms from the source
archive. See `LICENSE` in this directory for attribution details and the source
link to the canonical terms.

## Local Scope

This repository includes a subset of Sonora Cholla spectra used for figure/model
comparison workflows. It is not a complete mirror of the upstream dataset.
